response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. For you, considering its worth of $120, we propose a special introductory price of $110. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable price. We hope you'll find this proposal appealing and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 110}
